title: L'oreal Professional Paris Absolut Repair Cellular Lactic Acid Shampoo, 8.45-Ounce Bottle
description: L'Oreal Professionnel Absolut Repair Shampoo is a fortifying and restorative shampoo for hair that has lost structure, volume and strength.

title: L'Oreal Professional Series Vitamino Color Shampoo, 8.45-Ounce Bottle
description: L'Oreal Professional Series Vitamino Color Shampoo is designed for normal-to-thick, and slightly to-moderately sensitized hair. It nourishes and protects the hair fiber, making hair supple and silky, while instantly detangling. Protects the radiance of your color longer.
